thread.title: Kareena Kapoor Khan says returning to the ramp after pregnancy is even more special

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Kareena Kapoor Khan says returning to the ramp after pregnancy is even more special
text: Kareena Kapoor Khan saysâ€¦ Kareena Kapoor Khan says returning to the ramp after pregnancy is even more special Kareena Kapoor Khan is all set to bring the curtains down at the Lakme Fashion Week 2017 finale tonight and just before she headed to prepping up for the show, we managed to steal a few seconds from her and asked her about how it feels walking the ramp post pregnancy. By Snehal Rajani | Published: February 5, 2017 9:24 pm
